title: Our God is a God of Love
author: M. H. H.

verses.text:
Do you know what the ser - vants re - cite? As they speak in love with me?
Do you know what the con - vents bright Are singing from morning till night?
Do you know what the roll - ers re - cite? As they rest in the har - vest field?
Do you know what the work - ers re - cite? As they jin - gle the yoke as they yield?

It is 'Love, love, love!' It is 'Love, love, love!'
It is 'Love, love, love!' Our God is a God of love!

chorus.text:
It is 'Love, love, love!' It is 'Love, love, love!'
It is 'Love, love, love!' Our God is a God of love!
